label: SearchResult
description: A document found by a search query, plus associated metadata.

fields.label: Score
fields.tooltip: Relevance score of the document compared to other documents returned by the query.

fields.label: Reranker Score
fields.tooltip: Semantic ranker score for the top search results (semantic query type only).

fields.label: Reranker Boosted Score
fields.tooltip: Relevance score computed by boosting the Reranker Score (semantic query type only).

fields.label: Highlights
fields.tooltip: Text fragments indicating matching search terms, organized by each applicable field.
